channel.title: Jar maker need help!
channel.description:
does any1 know how i can make my server on a jar like mopar, i mean run the server and client in one java screen if any1 knows please tell me
i have tried jar maker but i dont know how to code it if any one knows how i can code it or a tutor on mopar please tell me

item.title: Jar maker need help!
item.dc:creator: @Parker3 Parker`
item.description:
@Parker3 wrote:

Wrong section, also a GUI is what controlls the server in a Java applet. There is a tutorial around here somewhere just use the search bar. Same goes for the client Jar creation.

Read full topic
